```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

Results from Rob's computer, using R version 3.3.1 (2016-06-21) and asreml 3.0.

### Wald tests
```{r}
w <- read.csv("results-wald.csv", as.is=TRUE)
w %>% kable(digits=c(0,0,2,0,4))
```

### plots
```{r}
d <- read.csv("results-fit.csv", as.is=TRUE)
ds <- split(d, d[,c("response", "var")])

for(i in seq_along(ds)) {
  foo <- as.numeric(as.character(ds[[i]]$level))
  if(!any(is.na(foo))) ds[[i]]$level <- paste(round(foo,2))
}

for(i in seq_along(ds)) {
  p <- ggplot(ds[[i]]) + aes(time, predicted.value, group=level, color=level) + 
    geom_line() +
    geom_line(aes(y=predicted.value+standard.error), lty=2) +
    geom_line(aes(y=predicted.value-standard.error), lty=2) +
    ggtitle(names(ds)[i])
  plot(p)
}
```
